Instructions

Here are the instructions for the game:

Start

Click on the "Start" button and insert your name to start the game.

Paddle Moviment

Move mouse horizontally to move the paddle.

Ball Moviment

the Ball moves to the RIGHT if hit by the LEFT portion of the paddle.

Ball Moviment

the Ball moves to the LEFT if hit by the LEFT portion of the paddle.

Level Selection

A diffetent level can be selected by clicking on Level button.

Restart

Click on Restart button to restart the game on default level and keep playing.
